briefTitle: A Study of Zolpidem Tartrate Sublingual Tablet in Adult Patients With Insomnia
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group Study of the Efficacy and Safety of the Zolpidem Tartrate Sublingual Tablet in Adult Subjects With Insomnia Characterized by Difficulty Returning to Sleep After Awakening in the Middle-of-the-Night (MOTN)
summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate sleep onset following administration of zolpidem tartrate sublingual tablet (Intermezzo) versus placebo in adult insomnia patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Latency to Sleep Onset After Middle-of-the-Night Awakening at Baseline
